explains: n. （缓慢地）放下，降下；减少，降低；降下人或物
adj. 乌云密布的，阴沉的；黑暗的，昏暗的；使低劣的；减少体力的
wordGroup: lower oneself 失身份；自甘堕落
lower level 下水平，低电平
lower house 下议院；众议院
lower leg 小腿；（侧泳）靠下面的腿；胫
lower class 下层阶级；下层社会

sentences.en: She never cheapened herself by lowering her standards.
sentences.cn: 她从不降低标准来贬低自己。

sentences.en: The Japanese are expert at lowering manufacturing costs.
sentences.cn: 日本人在降低生产成本方面很在行。

sentences.en: The lowering of trade barriers has led to a free-for-all among exporters.
sentences.cn: 降低贸易壁垒导致出口商各自为政。
